gallery.name: Beautiful Creatures
gallery.description: Imaginative creatures and depictions of life. All paintings are oil and encaustic on canvas.
gallery.extraDescription: The larger than normal depth creates a sculptural element to the art, and eliminates the need for a traditional frame.

artPieces.description: What lies within the mist, is it safe?
artPieces.name: Tentacles Lurking in Woods
artPieces.media: Oil and encaustic on canvas with wood framing
